conversation.message: Hello School_D Admissions Committee—I'm Student_B. I’m very interested in joining School_D and believe I would be a strong fit for your program and community. I’m ready to commit if offered a seat. Thank you for your consideration.

Since B is our top-choice and is willing to commit immediately, accepting now secures our best possible match; delaying risks losing B to other schools (B’s top choice is School_E) and cannot improve beyond top rank. Therefore accept Student_B and fill the seat.
